text: Qua propter ego Swiðuulf episcopus& ða higan æt Hrofes cestredabunt Biorhtuulfo presbytero aliquam partem terre in provincio Cantiæ in regione que vocaturHaddun.

Hæc sunt ætenim termini histius predicti agelli circum acentiabisceopes mearc an norðan east be hunesbiorge oð ciolmundes mearce & ðes landes mere swe suð ober haddune middewearde & ober ðane ealdan tunsteall oð cinges mearce & suð be cinges mearce oð ðane myclan del norðan & west be cinges mearce oð ciolmundes wioda & west be ðy wioda andlanges ðare rode oð ðane pyt & east fram ðy pytte ðurh ðane wioda wið suðan hunesbiorge & wen weg ðy lande ober ciolmundes land to ealdan strete.
Hæc sunt prata que ad illam terram pertinent Iet bioccan lea, & an suð healfe strodes an cyninges medum ða ðe ðær to belimpað.
Eadgar cynincg of his agenre handa sealde þas boc Leofrice on þara gewitnesse þe her beniþan standaþ.
